info.jemscampfires.eternalcozy: An eternal cozy fire with %s seconds of fuel left (%s ticks).
info.jemscampfires.eternalbonfire: An eternal bonfire with %s seconds of fuel left (%s ticks).
info.jemscampfires.regularcozy: A cozy fire with %s seconds of fuel left (%s ticks).
info.jemscampfires.regularbonfire: A bonfire with %s seconds of fuel left (%s ticks).
info.jemscampfires.unlitnofuel: The campfire is unlit with no fuel left.
info.jemscampfires.unliteternalnofuel: The campfire is unlit, eternal, and with no fuel left.
info.jemscampfires.unlitfuel: The campfire is unlit with some fuel left.
info.jemscampfires.unliteternalfuel: The campfire is unlit, eternal, and with some fuel left.
info.jemscampfires.waterlogged: The campfire is waterlogged, you can't light it.
